text: Sverke Lorgen (born 20 July 1973) is a Norwegian rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He graduated from Harvard University. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Norway Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Harvard Crimson rowers
title: Sverke Lorgen
